net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: dnd5e_Util_formatTooltip
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip:
Updates the passed string so that it is a "title" attribute for any HTML tag.
This allows the text to be formatted as HTML. This only works if the tooltip is being
displayed in MapTool's chat, as it uses the underlying swing tooltips which allow HTML.

arg(0) = String to be formatted
arg(1) = Optional; The width of the tooltip box

Returns the string properly encoded to display in a Java Swing tooltip as a "title" attribute.
If an empty string is passed an empty string is returned.
